title: Homan-Newspaper Control in America(jewish newspaper monopoly)(19
description: This is Robert Homan's amazing booklet Newspaper Control in America (1967) which is a classic expose of predominant jewish control of the newspapers in America and how this situation is constantly abused to manipulate the news. It details the ownership of major American media and clearly shows how that a news monopoly in America has been already achieved decades ago and continues to this very day. Find out who is behind the mainstream media and how easy it is to fake all the news you want once you achieve such an informational monopoly. 30 pages. A must read for everyone.
